main event: On June 6, 1958, an observer in Dayton, Ohio reported seeing a round reddish object resembling the size of a pinhead, which looked similar to a star.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 11 minutes,The object was likely seen around 04577 GMT,The report speculated that the observer might have seen a jet aircraft operating with an afterburner,The weather conditions were reported as clear, and the observer experienced no wind,This was not the first sighting by the witness, who reported a previous observation in 1952.
witness description: The witness was a retired insurance worker, aged 12 at the time of the sighting.
